    • About Steven Rosado


    With over 15 years of marketing, sales, and service industry experience, I’ve had the opportunity to work with so many great clients. My business philosophy has always been a very simple one: “I give my clients MORE value than my competition can offer.” I do this by out-working my competition, providing my clients with all relevant information, and creating customized plans of action to reach their specific goals.
